about_the_game:
Enjoy Castle Story's highly acclaimed, unique and captivating soundtrack. Featuring over 90 minutes of music, from the very first song of the Kickstarter trailer, to the newest ones.

Tracklist

01 - The Greatest Castle (04:05) by FX Dupas, Mathieu Lavoie

02 - The Strange Universe Under Our Feet (03:27) by Mattias Häggström Gerdt
03 - Lonely Lonely Bricktron (03:29) by FX Dupas, Mathieu Lavoie
04 - Marching in The Mist (03:12) by Mattias Häggström Gerdt
05 - Through Glowing Purple Eyes (05:12) by FX Dupas, Mathieu Lavoie
06 - A Sprinkling of Mischief (03:49) by FX Dupas, Mathieu Lavoie
07 - We Need a Bigger Wall (04:31) by FX Dupas, Mathieu Lavoie
08 - Stratospheric Sunrise (03:13) by FX Dupas, Mathieu Lavoie
09 - One Brick at a Time (03:01) by Mattias Häggström Gerdt
10 - Cloudsong (03:28) by Josh Whelchel
11 - Out of Reach (04:25) by FX Dupas, Mathieu Lavoie
12 - The Tiniest Fortress (03:37) by FX Dupas, Mathieu Lavoie
13 - The Warm Glow of our Home Crystal (03:51) by FX Dupas, Mathieu Lavoie
14 - A Bag Full of Treasures (03:58) by Josh Whelchel
15 - Dreaming Of Bricks (02:58) by FX Dupas, Mathieu Lavoie
16 - A Rope Bridge Too Far (04:33) by FX Dupas, Mathieu Lavoie
17 - Don't Dig Too Deep (04:27) by FX Dupas, Mathieu Lavoie
18 - Whispers of Bricktrons Past (05:11) by FX Dupas, Mathieu Lavoie
19 - Slumbering Beasts of the Deep (02:57) by Josh Whelchel
20 - Fists of Stone, Pounding at the Door (02:48) by Mattias Häggström Gerdt
21 - Éclipse Lunaire (05:54) by FX Dupas, Mathieu Lavoie
22 - A Monolith of Sorrow (04:34) by FX Dupas, Mathieu Lavoie
23 - Bricktrons Theme (03:44) by Mattias Häggström Gerdt
24 - Bonus Track: The Kickstarter Theme (01:56) by Josh Whelchel, Mattias Häggström Gerdt

Mastered by Stefan Aronsson.
